name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PDF Guru: PDF Converter & Editor Extension for Chrome

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PDF Guru's extension connects you to the platform so that you can convert, edit, compress, and merge files all in one place!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With our PDF converter extension, you get an all-in-one toolkit — convert files, edit content, organize pages, and so much more. 
Access these tools in just a few clicks:
- Convert to PDF: Transform Word, Excel, PowerPoint, EPUB, and image files into high-quality PDF documents.
- Convert from PDF: Turn PDF files into editable Word, Excel, PowerPoint, EPUB, and image formats.
- Edit PDFs: Make changes to text, images, and other elements in your PDFs without any hassle. 
- Compress PDFs: Reduce file sizes without losing quality, making it easier to share and store your documents.
- OCR for PDF: Extract text from scanned documents or images using powerful Optical Character Recognition (OCR) technology. 
- Fill PDFs: Complete forms right within the PDF Guru interface — no extra tools needed. 
- Merge PDFs: Combine multiple PDFs into a single, organized document in just a few simple steps.
- Split PDFs: Separate large PDFs into smaller, easier-to-use files.
How to get started:
1. Install our PDF editor extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Pin it to your toolbar for quick access.
3. Click the extension icon, choose a tool, and you’ll be taken to the upload window.
By using our PDF Guru extension, you agree to our Privacy Policy (https://pdfguru.com/privacy-policy)  and Terms & Conditions (https://pdfguru.com/terms). We’re all about keeping things safe and easy for you.
